title: Santa's Sinkhole
thumbnail_alt: Gingerbread house on top of a giant cake covered with stripes of red and green M&Ms.

media.caption: Giant cake with a single slice cut from it.
Gingerbread house on top of a giant cake covered with stripes of red and green M&Ms.

overview: Six alternating layers of red-dyed chocolate and green-dyed white cake, carved out and stuffed with chocolate chip cookies and M&M's. Frosted and filled with vanilla buttercream, and topped with a layer of precision-aligned M&M's and an entire gingerbread house.
